    • Method Detail

      • setValues

        public static void setValues(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
             javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Initializes the PlanningPreset.java Class by setting Parameters to handle the request. It both initializes parameters (e.g. selected Plant, Year, ..) and sets variables that call a special case (Load Data, Save Data, Reset Grit,...). Note: This method must be called before using any other method of this class.
        Parameters:
        request -
        session -

      • LocationSelection

        public static java.lang.String LocationSelection(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Queries all plants from the Database (Table "plants") and creates an option field with radio-buttons that can be implemented directly into a Html/.jsp page.

      • getTable

        public static java.lang.String getTable()
        Creates table that will be implemented and displayed to user. Adds sum to every column displayed.

      • getSavedPlannings

        public static java.lang.String getSavedPlannings()
        Queries and displays if a save to respective year and plant exists. It only displays who(user), when(timestamp) and what(year and plant) of the save.
